CustomField.description: It populates this address field based on the record type.
CustomField.formula: IF(OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = "NS_OnlineCustomerCorporate",RecordType.DeveloperName = "NS_FieldLocation"), NS_PhysicalAddressDetails__c ,IF(RecordType.DeveloperName = "NS_OnlineCustomerBusiness", NS_BillingAddressDetails__c , IF(RecordType.DeveloperName = "NS_3PL", NS_MailingAddressDetails__c , IF(OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = "NS_OnlineCustomerService",RecordType.DeveloperName = "NS_OfflineCustomer",RecordType.DeveloperName = "NS_OtherRailRoad",RecordType.DeveloperName = "NS_OtherCompany",RecordType.DeveloperName = "NS_DrayCarrier",RecordType.DeveloperName = "NS_Port"), NS_ShippingAddressDetails__c , ''))))
CustomField.label: Address
